creator: rsriman@yahoo.com
text:
We have a virtual host which is being used by more than 12 apps, all 
applications have a Alias to the virtual host. Each app listens on a different 
Port and share the same certificate. We use name based virtual host. We get 
this error when starting apache in the SSL mode.
Can you give an example configuration to trigger this?
creator: jorton@redhat.com
nick@webthing.com
text: No info from OP; much has changed since this report.
